definition: rampart/base (in baseball)/to build with stones, bricks etc
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: He went deep several times in the final game.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛最后的时候，他打了好几支全垒打。

sentences.english: It's a year — as those of us who love baseball would say — for swinging for the fences.
sentences.chinese: 热爱棒球的人会说，这是打全垒打的一年。

sentences.english: During his lifetime, he hit a total of seven hundred fourteen home runs.
sentences.chinese: 在他的一生中，他创下了七百一十四全垒打总数。

sentences.english: It was down to the last strike and John hit a home run.
sentences.chinese: 到了最后一棒，约翰打了个全垒打。

sentences.english: Kuo became the first Taiwanese player in major-league history to hit a home run.
sentences.chinese: 郭成为史上第一位在大联盟打出全垒打的台湾球员。

sentences.english: King hit a home run, evening up the score.
sentences.chinese: 金击出一个全垒打，吧比分拉平了。

sentences.english: He clubbed a two-run homer over the right field fence.
sentences.chinese: 他打了一个引跑两圈的全垒打，过了右外场。

sentences.english: In nineteen twenty-seven, he hit sixty home runs.
sentences.chinese: 在一九二七年，他打了六十支全垒打。

sentences.english: Home runs boost Wang, Nationals to win.
sentences.chinese: 全垒打助王建民一臂之力，国民胜出。

sentences.english: Wang owns a streak of 43 consecutive innings without giving up a home run.
sentences.chinese: 小王保持著连续43局未被打出全垒打的纪录。

sentences.english: Mike hit the first homer for the team to right field in the bottom of the first.
sentences.chinese: 迈可在第一局下半击出右外野方向的第一支全垒打。

sentences.english: "The other side is very lucky, " he said after the grand slam.
sentences.chinese: 对手实在非常幸运”在满贯全垒打后他也这么表示。

sentences.english: "I feel good, " said Cabrera, who had eight homers in 545 at-bats last season.
sentences.chinese: 小卡布说，他去年球季545个打次有八支全垒打。

sentences.english: Jason surprised everybody by hitting three home runs in a row.
sentences.chinese: 贾森连续三支全垒打让大家很惊讶。

sentences.english: If he did not, the home run would not have counted.
sentences.chinese: 如果他没有做到这一点，这个全垒打就不算。

sentences.english: Wakefield (4-5) walked five in five innings and served up both New York homers.
sentences.chinese: 在五局的投球中有5次保送，并被敲出全垒打。

definition: to strike out/strikeout (baseball, softball)/(Tw) to ditch/to eliminate from consideration
